abstract: This Halloween, the Gateway Playhouse is threatening to become the most haunted location in Suffolk County.
snippet: This Halloween, the Gateway Playhouse is threatening to become the most haunted location in Suffolk County.
lead_paragraph: Strange noises and muffled screams have been startling neighbors from their sleep in Bellport Village, N.Y., since the beginning of the month. Some say that they're coming from the big red barn at the edge of town, but that's been abandoned since the end of the Long Island theater's famed summer season. The source of the wickedness is the Gateway Playhouse, known by some as the most haunted location in Suffolk County.
